name: Bean Wish Well
description:
Bean Wish Well

"Nice" is the best word to describe this game. The story is about a bean that was one of many thrown into a lucky well. That bean has started to grow and slowly exits the well, but facing many hardships. 

To control your bean use:

- you MOUSE for direction
- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON for dash when available

GREEN BEANS act like checkpoints and shops, where you can buy things.
RED BEANS take your bean on another level. Make sure you don't miss them!
ENERGY METER in the bottom middle of screen is your durability until you die. Extend your life span by collecting ENERGY SUNS. They also grant points for buying items in the shop.

I hope you will enjoy. It was a tough 5 days game to make because of the artstyle I have chosen. It's a bit rought, but thats what you get for 5 days worth of game development from a programmer.

Thanks for playing!
